verses.verse: וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Kem that [were] with him rose up early יְרֻבַּ֜עַל <S%H3378><s%> ye-rub-Ba-'al Then Jerubbaal ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he גִדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on, who [is] Gideon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all manner הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside עֵ֣ין 'ein חֲרֹ֑ד <S%H5878><s%> cha-Rod; beside the well of Harod וּמַחֲנֵ֤ה <S%H4264><s%> u-ma-cha-Neh so that the host מִדְיָן֙ <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan of the Midianites הָיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> ha-yah- become ל֣וֹ lo מִצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tza-Fon, were on the north side מִגִּבְעַ֥ת <S%H1389><s%> mig-giv-'At of them by the hill הַמּוֹרֶ֖ה <S%H4176><s%> ham-mo-Reh of Moreh בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <S%H6010><s%> ba-'E-mek. in the valley

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גִּדְע֔וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on, unto Gideon רַ֗ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav, that [are] with thee [are] too many הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am The people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach, for מִתִּתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> mit-tit-Ti for me to give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan the Midianites בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dam; into their hands פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- would יִתְפָּאֵ֨ר <S%H6286><s%> yit-pa-'Er vaunt עָלַ֤י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai for יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El lest Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, themselves against me saying יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di Mine own hand הוֹשִׁ֥יעָה <S%H3467><s%> ho-Shi-'ah hath saved לִּֽי׃ Li.

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, henceforth קְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> ke-Ra proclaim נָ֜א <S%H4994><s%> na Now therefore go to בְּאָזְנֵ֤י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nei in the ears הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- any יָרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> ya-Re Whosoever [is] fearful וְחָרֵ֔ד <S%H2730><s%> ve-cha-Red, and afraid יָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Sho let him return וְיִצְפֹּ֖ר <S%H6852><s%> ve-yitz-Por and depart early מֵהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> me-Har from mount הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad; Gilead וַיָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov And there returned מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, of the people עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim and two אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> va-'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand נִשְׁאָֽרוּ׃ <S%H7604><s%> nish-'A-ru. and there remained ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גִּדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on, unto Gideon עוֹד֮ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od are still הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am The people רָב֒ <S%H7227><s%> rav [are] yet [too] many הוֹרֵ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> ho-Red bring them down אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim, unto the water וְאֶצְרְפֶ֥נּוּ <S%H6884><s%> ve-'etz-re-Fen-nu and I will try לְךָ֖ le-Cha שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of whom אֹמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mar them for thee there and it shall be [that] of whom I say אֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you זֶ֣ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> zeh This יֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech shall go אִתָּ֗ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach, for ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he יֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech shall go אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach, but וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- of whom אֹמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mar with thee and of whomsoever I say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, about זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh one לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not יֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech go עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, with ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not יֵלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech. go

וַיּ֥וֹרֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Yo-red So he brought down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim; unto the water ס sa-Mek וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גִּדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on, unto Gideon כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> kol everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יָלֹק֩ <S%H3952><s%> ya-Lok Every one that lappeth בִּלְשׁוֹנ֨וֹ <S%H3956><s%> bil-sho-No with his tongue מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַמַּ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim of the water כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher who יָלֹ֣ק <S%H3952><s%> ya-Lok lappeth הַכֶּ֗לֶב <S%H3611><s%> hak-Ke-lev, as a dog תַּצִּ֤יג <S%H3322><s%> tatz-Tzig him shalt thou set אוֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad, shall separate וְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יִכְרַ֥ע <S%H3766><s%> yich-Ra' by himself likewise every one that boweth down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon בִּרְכָּ֖יו <S%H1290><s%> bir-Kav upon his knees לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8354><s%> lish-Tot. to drink

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become מִסְפַּ֞ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par And the number הַֽמֲלַקְקִ֤ים <S%H3952><s%> ha-ma-lak-Kim of them that lapped בְּיָדָם֙ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dam [putting] their hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פִּיהֶ֔ם <S%H6310><s%> pi-Hem, to their mouth שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh were three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; men וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Ye-ter but all the rest הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, of the people כָּרְע֥וּ <S%H3766><s%> ka-re-'U bowed down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon בִּרְכֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1290><s%> bir-chei-Hem upon their knees לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <S%H8354><s%> lish-Tot to drink מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. water ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- unto גִּדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on, unto Gideon בִּשְׁלֹשׁ֩ <S%H7969><s%> bish-Losh By the three מֵא֨וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish men הַֽמֲלַקְקִים֙ <S%H3952><s%> ha-ma-lak-Kim that lapped אוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <S%H3467><s%> o-Shi-a' will I save אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti you and deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan the Midianites בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha; into thine hand וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, and let all the [other] people יֵלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chu go אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man לִמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> lim-ko-Mo. unto his place

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֵדָה֩ <S%H6720><s%> tze-Dah victuals הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am So the people בְּיָדָ֜ם <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dam in their hand וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שׁוֹפְרֹֽתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H7782><s%> shof-ro-tei-Hem, and their trumpets וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El [the rest of] Israel שִׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> shil-Lach and he sent אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man לְאֹֽהָלָ֔יו <S%H168><s%> le-'o-ha-Lav, unto his tent וּבִשְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> u-vish-losh- those three מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish men הֶֽחֱזִ֑יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik; and retained וּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> u-ma-cha-Neh and the host מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan, of Midian הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah become ל֖וֹ lo מִתַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat Thahash בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <S%H6010><s%> ba-'E-mek. was beneath him in the valley פ Peh

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> bal-Lay-lah And it came to pass the same night הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, now the same וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, that the LORD ק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum unto him Arise רֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> red get thee down בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> bam-ma-cha-Neh; unto the host כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נְתַתִּ֖יו <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Tiv for I have delivered בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha. it into thine hand

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if יָרֵ֥א <S%H3373><s%> ya-Re But if thou fear אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you לָרֶ֑דֶת <S%H3381><s%> la-Re-det; to go down רֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> red down אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּפֻרָ֥ה <S%H6513><s%> u-fu-Rah thou with Phurah נַעַרְךָ֖ <S%H5288><s%> na-'ar-Cha thy servant אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Ham-ma-cha-Neh. to the host

וְשָֽׁמַעְתָּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> ve-sha-ma'-Ta And thou shalt hear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Be-ru, what they say וְאַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char and afterward תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <S%H2388><s%> te-che-Zak-nah be strengthened יָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dei-cha, shall thine hands וְיָרַדְתָּ֖ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-rad-Ta to go down בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> bam-ma-cha-Neh; unto the host וַיֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red Then went he down הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu he וּפֻרָ֣ה <S%H6513><s%> u-fu-Rah with Phurah נַעֲר֔וֹ <S%H5288><s%> na-'a-Ro, his servant אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> ke-Tzeh unto the outside הַחֲמֻשִׁ֖ים <S%H2571><s%> ha-cha-mu-Shim of the armed men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that was בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Bam-ma-cha-Neh. that [were] in the host

וּמִדְיָ֨ן <S%H4080><s%> u-mid-Yan And the Midianites וַעֲמָלֵ֤ק <S%H6002><s%> va-'a-ma-Lek and the Amalekites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- and all the children קֶ֙דֶם֙ <S%H6924><s%> ke-dem of the east נֹפְלִ֣ים <S%H5307><s%> no-fe-Lim lay בָּעֵ֔מֶק <S%H6010><s%> ba-'E-mek, along in the valley כָּאַרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H697><s%> ka-'ar-Beh like grasshoppers לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> la-Ro; for multitude וְלִגְמַלֵּיהֶם֙ <S%H1581><s%> ve-lig-mal-lei-Hem and their camels אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein were without מִסְפָּ֔ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par, [were] without number כַּח֛וֹל <S%H2344><s%> ka-Chol as the sand שֶׁעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> she-'al- and שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat side הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam by the sea לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> la-Ro. for multitude

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo was come גִדְע֔וֹן <S%H1439><s%> gid-'on, And when Gideon וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-Hin-neh- behold אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, behold [there was] a man מְסַפֵּ֥ר <S%H5608><s%> me-sap-Per that told לְרֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> le-re-'E-hu unto his fellow חֲל֑וֹם <S%H2472><s%> cha-Lom; a dream וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold חֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> cha-Lom a dream חָלַ֗מְתִּי <S%H2492><s%> cha-Lam-ti, Behold I dreamed וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh Behold; צְלֹול tze-lol כצְלִ֜יל <S%H6742><s%> tze-Lil cake קלֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread שְׂעֹרִים֙ <S%H8184><s%> se-'o-Rim of barley מִתְהַפֵּךְ֙ <S%H2015><s%> mit-hap-peCh tumbled בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> be-ma-cha-Neh into the host מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan, of Midian וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against הָ֠אֹהֶל <S%H168><s%> Ha-'o-hel unto a tent וַיַּכֵּ֧הוּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ke-hu and smote וַיִּפֹּ֛ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol it that it fell וַיַּהַפְכֵ֥הוּ <S%H2015><s%> vai-ya-haf-Che-hu and turned לְמַ֖עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma'-lah upside וְנָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> ve-na-Fal lay along הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel. it that the tent
